name: The Crayon Occasional Table
description: The Crayon Occasional Table from the Wanderlust Collection is the perfect solution if you're looking for a stylish addition to your home. A sleek example of contemporary British furniture design. This piece is available in a range of high gloss and satin colours. Which is ideal for those wanting to add a pop of colour to their interior. For those who prefer the timber look, the table is also available in Davidson's signature timber finishes. Its unique round table top is detailed with a polished flat frieze. And smooth indentation, atop a bold crayon–shaped base. The table is available in a standard size, with bespoke options upon request – so no matter what colour or size you're after, the Crayon occasional table has you covered!
